title: Sovereign AGI Common Type System
description: Defines reusable, strongly typed structures and primitive references for use across all module interfaces and configurations.

additionalProperties.description: A named, complex type definition (e.g., an object structure or discriminated union).

schema.description: The JSON Schema definition describing this complex type.

standard_primitives.description: Standard primitives referenced by AGI (e.g., UUID, Timestamp, ErrorCode).
